final_mermaid_code:
graph TD
    subgraph SiteEng["Site Eng."]
        A[New Equipment Needed] --> B[Submit equipment rental request]
    end

    subgraph BuildITClerk["Clerk"]
        B --> C[Select suitable equipment]
        C --> D[Check availability]
        D -->|Not available| C
        D -->|Available| E{XORGateway}
    end

    subgraph WorksEng["Works Eng."]
        E -->|Available| F[Review rental request]
        F --> G{XORGateway}
        G -->|Approved| H[Create PO]
        G -->|Rejected| I[Request Rejected]
    end

    H --> J[PO Created]
